message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $10000 for the product at this time.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13000.
